query:
ALTER TABLE `database_backups` 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `isEncrypted` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `encryptionKeyId` varchar(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `encryptionAlgorithm` varchar(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `encryptionIv` varchar(64);

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `isEncrypted` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `encryptionKeyId` varchar(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `encryptionAlgorithm` varchar(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS `encryptionIv` varchar(64);
